author: world today news
title: VfL Bochum Defeats Berlin Union in Wild Roller-Coaster Game: Match Highlights and Analysis - World Today News
text: Bochum above: VfL left Berlin defeated on the ground. Source: dpa VfL Bochum the duel is in the basement Berlin Union decide for themselves. Coach Heiko Butscher’s team won 4:3 (3:0) against their rivals with the same points. With success in a wild roller-coaster game, VfL has taken a big step towards staying in the league and has exacerbated the relegation worries at 1. FC Union Berlin, which was deserted for half time. Berlin is no longer useful in catching up Even a big increase in Berlin’s performance after the break was no longer of any use. The race to catch up was not crowned. There is only one point from the last six games under (current) coach Nenad Bjelica. Bundesliga football away and can no longer be put down straight, it seems that the rescue of the Union in the state of the first half will only be possible if the competition is out Mainz and Cologne there are no more scores. Double pack from Wittek Bundesliga RB Leipzig given in August 2019. Back then it was a lesson, this time it was a breakdown and a mortgage that was too much for the second half. After three recent defeats, Union Berlin got a point with the 0-0 draw in Mönchengladbach, but the Iron Men were not happy about it. Gladbach must continue to shake as well.29.04.2024 | 8:38 minutes Maximilian Wittek (16th / 31st minute), Keven Schlotterbeck (37th) and Philipp Hofmann (70th) scored the goals for the relief hosts on Sunday in the sold-out stadium at the Alte Försterei with 22,012 spectators. Yorbe Vertessen (59th), Chris Bedia (62nd) with his first Bundesliga goal and Benedict Hollerbach (74th) gave Berlin precious moments of hope in the end. Coach Bjelica’s chair moves nervously Where there is a crisis, there is a lot of talk. This is no different in the Union. Before it started, club boss Dirk Zingler strongly opposed the “kicker” report that Bjelica would be over in the Köpenick area after the season anyway. The deadline for media admissions could now be reached quickly. Robin Gosens was recently missing from Nagelsmann’s national coaching team. What still gives him hope for his possible participation in the European Championship and how he sees his future at Union Berlin.31.03.2024 | 22:31 min With their performance up to the half-time whistle, the Iron Men did not give the impression that Bjelica had given any impetus to the long rescue. The first half was a waste for Berlin Bochum’s team showed their shortcomings with their quick first attack. Wittek had little trouble firing home a cross from Moritz Broschinski to give VfL the lead. Because it was so easy, the 28-year-old repeated his task on his own fifteen minutes later. Four Union professionals looked on politely from a safe non- football distance. “Wake up,” said the fans. A deep sleep followed the Iron Ones. Schlotterbeck – a non-relegation hero in the Union’s debut season in the Bundesliga in 2020 – was invited not to face the third goal for the visitors. “We’re staying in,” said the Bochum fans. Bochum defends its lead until the end against FC Bayern at 1:5 The second half was almost bearable two weeks ago. But against Bochum? There was a team on the pitch without any enthusiasm, without any will. But important words must have been spoken at half-time. This time the lead: In the 3-2 victory against TSG Hoffenheim, VfL Bochum did not let the butter escape them so often and collected important points in the relegation battle.29.04.2024 | 7:26 min After three changes (Aaronson, Bedia, Vertessen) and a tactical change, the fighting spirit of the Union was back. Vertessen and Bedia’s goals were forced in Union style. But there was no happy ending in Berlin. With his goal, Hofmann showed the characteristics of a center forward that the Union needs, even if Hollerbach gave hope again. Source: SID, dpa 2024-05-05 17:15:17 # Bundesliga #Bochum #wins #basement #duel #Union

author: sina.com.cn
title: 国泰估值优势混合(LOF)C净值上涨3.05%|国泰_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
国泰估值优势混合型证券投资基金(LOF)（简称：国泰估值优势混合(LOF)C，代码016616）公布4月23日最新净值，上涨3.05%。
国泰估值优势混合(LOF)C成立于2022年9月9日，业绩比较基准为 沪深300指数 收益率×80%+中证全债指数收益率×20%。该基金成立以来收益-6.86%，今年以来收益23.89%，近一月收益-7.78%，近一年收益38.50%。近一年，该基金排名同类258/7823。
基金经理为王兆祥。王兆祥自2022年9月9日管理（或拟管理）该基金，任职期内收益-6.86%。
最新定期报告显示，该基金前十大重仓股如下：
股票代码 股票名称 持仓占比 持仓股数（股） 持仓市值（元） 002706 良信股份 8.92% 18583281 1.67亿 300100 双林股份 8.73% 2718001 1.64亿 002112 三变科技 7.95% 10280400 1.49亿 603063 禾望电气 7.86% 4545600 1.47亿 002028 思源电气 6.93% 1712046 1.3亿 688503 聚和材料 6.22% 3031035 1.17亿 688279 峰岹科技 4.49% 360255 8426万 301160 翔楼新材 4.29% 845700 8049.37万 002222 福晶科技 4.20% 2302530 7876.96万 603809 豪能股份 4.18% 4884149 7853.71万

author: Alejandro Sanchez
title: Israel asume el "fracaso" en el rescate de tres rehenes a los que mató: "Los ataques podrían haberse evitado"
text: El Ejército israelí ha asumido su "fracaso" en su misión de rescatar a los tres rehenes que las tropas israelíes mataron en Gaza por error el pasado 15 de diciembre, tras publicar este jueves una investigación con más detalles del incidente. "Las fuerzas israelíes fracasaron en su misión de rescatar a los rehenes", y "toda la cadena de mando se siente responsable", aseguró el jefe de Estado Mayor, Herzi Halevi, en las conclusiones de las pesquisas hechas por el Ejército que se han difundido este jueves. Según lamentó Halevi, "los ataques a los cautivos podrían haberse evitado", ya que "en una situación donde no existe una amenaza inmediata y no se identifica un enemigo claro, es necesario un momento de examen antes de disparar". "Esto es necesario para evitar, entre otras cosas, incidentes en los que nuestras fuerzas disparen contra nuestras fuerzas", agregó. Según reconoció, en el caso de los tres rehenes muertos, estos "no se movían amenazadoramente y sostenían una bandera blanca", por lo que habría sido "correcto confirmar la identificación antes de disparar", pero "las condiciones de presión y el entorno operativo dificultaron que los soldados implementaran estas medidas". Sin embargo, no se espera que el Ejército israelí tome medidas disciplinarias contra los militares que mataron a los tres cautivos. "No oyeron la orden" De acuerdo con la investigación militar, uno de los rehenes, Yotam Haim, recibió disparos un cuarto de hora después de que los soldados que operaban en el barrio de Shijayia de la ciudad de Gaza hubieran disparado ya a los dos otros rehenes, Samer Talalka y Alon Shamriz. Según las propias pesquisas, Haim huyó tras los disparos contra los dos otros cautivos, y "aproximadamente 15 minutos después, el comandante del batallón escuchó gritos en hebreo de 'ayuda'". Tras ello, "dio órdenes para suspender el fuego, gritando en hebreo 'venid hacia nosotros'", ante lo que el rehén "emergió de un edificio hacia las fuerzas israelíes", pero "dos soldados, que no oyeron la orden" de cesar el fuego "por el ruido de un tanque cercano, le dispararon y mataron". Según la investigación, antes de que se les matara por error, los rehenes "caminaban sin camisa, y uno de ellos ondeaba una bandera blanca, parado en un punto de visibilidad limitada respecto a la posición del soldado que disparó".
